app.model

Class PlayerHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.model.PlayerHandler

  • public class PlayerHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    The PlayerHandler class handles players creation and their temporary status (dealer, shuffler, cutter, currentPlayer)
    Since:
    v0.6
    Version:
    v1.0.0
    Author:
    Arthur
    See Also:
    Hand
